Anita Beryl (amụrụ na 11 Jenụwarị 1986) bụ onye Uganda Fashion Designer, Couturier na Entrepreneur. Ọ bụ onye nduzi okike nke Beryl Qouture, ụlọ ejiji Uganda
Magazin Uganda, Satisfashion Uganda, kpọrọ Beryl otu n'ime Mmadu iri ano ndị na emeputa ihe n afọ 2016..
Nne na nna anita but Rev.and Mrs ahabwe ndị  mpaghara Bushenyi, ọ bụkwa nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ isii di na nwunye a mụrụ. Ọ gara Bweranyangyi Girls maka O na A-level wee pụọ na 2005
O mechara sonye na Uganda Christian University, Mukono, maka Bachelor of Arts in Education, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2009
O nwetara ọzụzụ ejiji mbụ ya na Uber Glam, na Johannesburg, South Africa, tupu ọ banye na French Fashion University, ESMOD

N'afọ 2011, ọ tọrọ ntọala Beryl Quoture By Anita Beryl, dị ka Haute Qouture ma dị njikere iyi uwe na ihe eji eme ihe maka ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị niile A kpọrọ akara ya ka ọ sonye na ihe ngosi ejiji obodo, mpaghara na mba ụwa gụnyere "Accra Fashion Week", na Ghana na "Swahili Fashion Week" na Tanzania, na 2016 naanị. N'afọ 2017, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gosipụta atụmatụ ya na World Fashion Week 2017, na Kuala Lampur, Malaysia. Ndị ahịa ya na-agbasawanye gụnyere ndị ahịa na Uganda, Kenya, Tanzania, South Africa, United Kingdom na mba ndị ọzọ. O gosipụtala atụmatụ ya na ngosi ejiji na Nigeria, Addis Ababa, Barcelona na Mombasa.
